verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H3372>feareth<s%> <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>, That <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H1368>mighty<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>: The <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> and <S%H6239>riches<s%> are in his <S%H1004>house<s%>; And his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endureth<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
Unto the <S%H3477>upright<s%> there <S%H2224>ariseth<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>: He is <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, and <S%H7349>merciful<s%>, and <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
Well <S%H2896><s%> is it with the <S%H376>man<s%> that dealeth <S%H2603>graciously<s%> and <S%H3867>lendeth<s%>; He shall <S%H3557>maintain<s%> his <S%H1697>cause<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
For he shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>moved<s%>; The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be had in <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2143>remembrance<s%>.
He shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>tidings<s%>: His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>, <S%H982>trusting<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5564>established<s%>, he shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, Until he <S%H7200>see<s%> his desire upon his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.

He hath <S%H6340>dispersed<s%>, he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%>; His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endureth<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: His <S%H7161>horn<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> with <S%H3519>honor<s%>.

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3707>it<s%>, and be grieved; He shall <S%H2786>gnash<s%> with his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, and melt <S%H4549>away<s%>: The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.
